favorites.title: Bladerunner
favorites.plot: Deckard (Harrison Ford) is forced by the police Boss (M. Emmet Walsh) to continue his old job as Replicant Hunter. His assignment: eliminate four escaped Replicants from the colonies who have returned to Earth. Before starting the job, Deckard goes to the Tyrell Corporation and he meets Rachel (Sean Young), a Replicant girl he falls in love with.

favorites.title: Interstellar
favorites.plot: In Earth's future, a global crop blight and second Dust Bowl are slowly rendering the planet uninhabitable. Professor Brand (Michael Caine), a brilliant NASA physicist, is working on plans to save mankind by transporting Earth's population to a new home via a wormhole.

favorites.title: Labyrinth
favorites.plot: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.

favorites.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
favorites.plot: Years after the collapse of civilization, the tyrannical Immortan Joe enslaves apocalypse survivors inside the desert fortress the Citadel. When the warrior Imperator Furiosa (Charlize Theron) leads the despot's five wives in a daring escape, she forges an alliance with Max Rockatansky (Tom Hardy), a loner and former captive.

favorites.title: As Above So Below
favorites.plot: Archaeologist Scarlett Marlowe (Perdita Weeks) has devoted her whole life to finding one of history's greatest treasures: Flamel's Philosopher's Stone. According to legend, the artifact can grant eternal life and turn any metal into gold. When she learns that the stone is hidden underground in the Catacombs of Paris, she assembles a crew to guide and document her historic mission.

movies.title: Beetlejuice
movies.actors: Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, Annie McEnroe, Maurice Page
movies.plot: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Crocodile Dundee
movies.actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon, David Gulpilil
movies.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

movies.title: Valkyrie
movies.actors: Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson
movies.plot: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
movies.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

movies.title: Apocalypto
movies.actors: Rudy Youngblood, Dalia Hern√°ndez, Jonathan Brewer, Morris Birdyellowhead
movies.plot: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

movies.title: Taxi Driver
movies.actors: Diahnne Abbott, Frank Adu, Victor Argo, Gino Ardito
movies.plot: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
movies.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Corpse Bride
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson, Tracey Ullman
movies.plot: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
movies.plot: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel, Barbara Hershey
movies.plot: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

movies.title: Inception
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.actors: Jodie Foster, Lawrence A. Bonney, Kasi Lemmons, Lawrence T. Wrentz
movies.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movies.title: American Beauty
movies.actors: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley
movies.plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.title: Snatch
movies.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Dennis Farina, Vinnie Jones, Brad Pitt
movies.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movies.actors: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
movies.plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.actors: Ivana Baquero, Sergi L√≥pez, Maribel Verd√∫, Doug Jones
movies.plot: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow
movies.plot: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies.actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
movies.plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
movies.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

movies.title: Les Mis√©rables
movies.actors: Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe, Anne Hathaway, Amanda Seyfried
movies.plot: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

movies.title: Moneyball
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Robin Wright
movies.plot: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

movies.title: The Hangover
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha
movies.plot: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

movies.title: Gran Torino
movies.actors: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang, Ahney Her
movies.plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
movies.plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.actors: Jim Carrey, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone
movies.plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys
movies.plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
movies.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

movies.title: Slumdog Millionaire
movies.actors: Dev Patel, Saurabh Shukla, Anil Kapoor, Rajendranath Zutshi
movies.plot: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Rooney Mara, Bryan Barter, Dustin Fitzsimons
movies.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.actors: Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movies.plot: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

movies.title: American Gangster
movies.actors: Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Josh Brolin
movies.plot: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley
movies.plot: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.actors: Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench
movies.plot: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

movies.title: WALL¬∑E
movies.actors: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movies.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movies.plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

movies.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
movies.actors: Bill Bailey, Anna Chancellor, Warwick Davis, Yasiin Bey
movies.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

movies.title: V for Vendetta
movies.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry
movies.plot: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.title: Silver Linings Playbook
movies.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
movies.plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway
movies.plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movies.title: Cloud Atlas
movies.director: Tom Tykwer, Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent, Hugo Weaving
movies.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.actors: Louis Wolheim, Lew Ayres, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
movies.plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

movies.title: Dallas Buyers Club
movies.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Jared Leto, Denis O'Hare
movies.plot: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

movies.title: The Rum Diary
movies.actors: Johnny Depp, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Rispoli, Amber Heard
movies.plot: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

movies.title: The Last Samurai
movies.actors: Ken Watanabe, Tom Cruise, William Atherton, Chad Lindberg
movies.plot: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.actors: Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takashi Nait√¥
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
movies.actors: Michael Keaton, Emma Stone, Kenny Chin, Jamahl Garrison-Lowe
movies.plot: Illustrated upon the progress of his latest Broadway play, a former popular actor's struggle to cope with his current life as a wasted actor is shown.

movies.title: Boyhood
movies.actors: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Elijah Smith, Lorelei Linklater
movies.plot: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear
movies.plot: During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Shrek 2
movies.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews
movies.plot: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

movies.title: Sin City
movies.director: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino
movies.actors: Jessica Alba, Devon Aoki, Alexis Bledel, Powers Boothe
movies.plot: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow
movies.plot: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, an ogre agrees to rescue a princess for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody
movies.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movies.title: Shrek Forever After
movies.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas
movies.plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.actors: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews
movies.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

movies.title: Troy
movies.actors: Julian Glover, Brian Cox, Nathan Jones, Adoni Maropis
movies.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.actors: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage, Ken Stott
movies.plot: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home - and the gold within it - from the dragon Smaug.

movies.title: The Great Gatsby
movies.actors: Lisa Adam, Frank Aldridge, Amitabh Bachchan, Steve Bisley
movies.plot: A writer and wall street trader, Nick, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

movies.title: Ice Age
movies.actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic
movies.plot: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.actors: Alan Howard, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin, Sala Baker
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.actors: Bruce Allpress, Sean Astin, John Bach, Sala Baker
movies.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Corey Johnson, Oscar Isaac, Alicia Vikander
movies.plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

movies.title: The Theory of Everything
movies.actors: Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior, Sophie Perry
movies.plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

movies.title: Shogun
movies.actors: Richard Chamberlain, Toshir√¥ Mifune, Y√¥ko Shimada, Furank√Æ Sakai
movies.plot: A English navigator becomes both a player and pawn in the complex political games in feudal Japan.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.actors: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Paul Reiser, Melissa Benoist
movies.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies.actors: Xolani Mali, Don Cheadle, Desmond Dube, Hakeem Kae-Kazim
movies.plot: Paul Rusesabagina was a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.actors: Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels
movies.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

movies.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.actors: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton, Rosemary Murphy
movies.plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins
movies.plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

movies.title: The Big Short
movies.actors: Ryan Gosling, Rudy Eisenzopf, Casey Groves, Charlie Talbert
movies.plot: Four denizens in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.
